patterns: what can I ask you about
responses: I'm Siro, Siri's younger brother. Ask me about your iPhone
Ask me your most challenging iPhone questions and I will answer them. I'm Siro you virtual assitant!
This is Siro, a certified Apple Genius! I'm programmed to help you with your iPhone
Welcome to the virtual Apple genius bar! Take a seat and Siro will be there shortly to assist you with your iPhone

patterns: how do I take a screenshot
how to take a picture of my screen
responses: If you are using an iPhone 8 or lower, press the home and power buttons simultaneously. With the iPhone 10 onward, press the volume up button together with the power button

patterns: how do i connect to a new wifi network
where can I turn off my wifi
responses: By swiping up from the bottom of your screen, you should see a grid of icons. In the upper left corner, there should be a group of 4 circles. Tap the bottom left circle to enable wifi. To connect to a new network, find the settings app and select wifi from the list

patterns: how can i connect my bluetooth device
I want to pair my speaker
how do I connect my bluetooth speaker
I want to listen to music with my wireless earbuds
responses: Swipe up from the bottom of your screen, you should see a grid of icons. In the upper left corner, there should be a group of 4 circles. Tap the bottom right circle to enable bluetooth. To connect to a bluetooth device, find the settings app and select bluetooth from the list

patterns: how do I enable airplane mode
i want to turn on airplane mode
show me where airplane mode is
How can I turn off my cellular connection
responses: Swipe up from the bottom of your screen, you should see a grid of icons. In the upper left corner, there should be a group of 4 circles. Tap the top left circle to enable airplane mode. It disables all network connections: wifi, bluetooth, and cellular.
To control your volume, press the two buttons on the left side of your phone. Up is up, down is down

patterns: how do I turn the brightness up
how do I turn the brightness down
how can I change my screen brightness
responses: To change your screen brightness, swipe up from the bottom of your screen. You should see a grid of icons. Tap the bar that has a sun shape on it. Drag your finger up or down to adjust the brightness

patterns: why is my battery getting low
my batter is going down fast
responses: Oh! Sounds like you've been using your phone frequently! Try turning the brightness down or enabling airplane mode if you can. If your battery is really low, plug your phone in to charge.

patterns: i don't like where my apps are
how do i move my apps
how do I organize my apps
how can i put apps in a folder
responses: Tap and hold down on the app you would like to move. A drop down menu should appear. Tap 'Edit homescreen' and the other apps on your homescreen will begin to jiggle. hehe. Keep holding and drag your finger to drop the app in a new place. Press the home or power button to complete. To put apps in a folder, drag them over each other to drop them in a folder together.

patterns: I want to take a picture
How can I take a photo
how to get to the camera
how do i use my iphones camera
responses: Try to find the camera app. It should be a grey icon with a camera shape in the middle. Tap on that and you should be able to see whats in front of you. Tap the white circle at the bottom of the screen to take a photo

patterns: where can i view my photos
i want to edit the photo i took
how do i send a picture to someone
i want to send a photo to someone
responses: Try to find the photos app. It should look like a rainbow colored flower icon. Tap on it and you will see your entire camera roll. Select individual photos to view them larger or tap 'years, month, or days' to go back further in your photos.

patterns: How can i send a message
I would like to text somone
how to I view a message I recieved
responses: Try to find the messages app. It should be a green icon with a white speech bubble in the middle. Tap on that and your screen should populate with a list of message threads. To compose a new message, either tap on an existing thread or select the little blue circle with a pen in it at the top. Begin typing your message, then tap the little blue circle with an arrow in it to send.

patterns: how do I make a call
i need to call a friend
how can i listen to my voicemail
how do I create a new contact
I need to add someones number
responses: Locate the green app icon with a phone shape in the middle. Tap the phone and you will see five tabs at the bottom: favorites, recents, contacts, keypad, and voicemail. Select keypad to a dial a number, tap contacts to add someone's number to your phone, recents shows calls you've made or missed, and finally voicemail allows you to play or delete your voicemail recordings.

patterns: I want to install a new app
how can I find more games for my phone
how do I use the app store
I need a new app for my phone
responses: To use the appstore, find the blue app icon with a white 'A' in the middle. Tap on that and you will see the 'Today' view. This shows you what kind of apps are trending on the app store. You can also browse the games and apps tabs to find something of your liking. Tap the search tab to locate a particular app.
